name: Hot Curves #GameZanga
description:
The game was inspired by Outrun and G-Zero games.

The theme:

The player ALWAYS HAVE THE CHOICE to pick the right turn and try to get the best timing.

The game was made using free and open-source software:

  • Godot Engine
  • Blender3D
  • Inkscape
  • Gimp
  • LMMS
  • Audacity
